title: Independent Peoples — S2 Core Fix
userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/141.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

cssRules.css: :root { --bg: #0f1216; --panel: #171b21; --text: #e6edf3; --muted: #9aa4b2; --border: #242a33; --accent: #4aa3ff; --steve: #f2880f; --tiny: #001a07; --tinyText: #b8ffd2; }
* { box-sizing: border-box; }
body { margin: 0px; background: var(--bg); color: var(--text); font: 14px / 1.45 system-ui, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Helvetica, Arial; }
.wrap { max-width: 1100px; margin: 0px auto; padding: 16px; }
.card { background: var(--panel); border: 1px solid var(--border); border-radius: 12px; padding: 14px; }
.row { display: flex; gap: 10px; align-items: center; flex-wrap: wrap; }
input, select { background: rgb(11, 15, 20); border: 1px solid var(--border); border-radius: 10px; color: var(--text); padding: 8px 10px; }
.btn { background: var(--accent); color: rgb(0, 19, 41); border: none; border-radius: 10px; padding: 8px 12px; font-weight: 700; cursor: pointer; }
.btn.small { padding: 4px 8px; font-size: 12px; border-radius: 8px; }
.small { font-size: 12px; color: var(--muted); }
.ide-label { font-weight: 800; }
.ide-Culture { color: rgb(216, 200, 255); }
.ide-Diplomatic { color: rgb(188, 212, 255); }
.ide-Scientific { color: rgb(209, 231, 255); }
.ide-Expansionist { color: rgb(201, 255, 217); }
.ide-Military { color: rgb(255, 209, 209); }
.ide-Economic { color: rgb(255, 232, 184); }
label.small:has(#hostile) { display: inline-flex; align-items: center; gap: 6px; }
#hostile { margin: 0px; }
.sections { display: grid; gap: 16px; margin-top: 12px; }
.section { background: var(--panel); border: 1px solid var(--border); border-radius: 12px; padding: 12px; }
.section .head { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; gap: 10px; }
.list { display: grid; gap: 8px; }
.item { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; gap: 10px; border: 1px solid var(--border); border-radius: 10px; padding: 8px 10px; background: rgb(11, 15, 20); }
.badge { padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 999px; border: 1px solid var(--border); font-size: 11px; }
.badge.hostile { background: rgb(59, 17, 17); border-color: rgb(128, 61, 61); color: rgb(255, 180, 180); }
.badge.region { background: rgb(16, 32, 26); border-color: rgb(29, 58, 46); color: rgb(184, 255, 210); }
.typeahead { position: relative; display: inline-block; min-width: 220px; }

.typeahead-list { position: absolute; top: 100%; left: 0px; right: 0px; background: rgb(11, 15, 20); border-right-color: ; border-right-style: ; border-right-width: ; border-bottom-color: ; border-bottom-style: ; border-bottom-width: ; border-left-color: ; border-left-style: ; border-left-width: ; border-image-source: ; border-image-slice: ; border-image-width: ; border-image-outset: ; border-image-repeat: ; border-top: none; max-height: 220px; overflow: auto; z-index: 20; border-radius: 0px 0px 10px 10px; display: none; }
.typeahead-item { padding: 8px 10px; cursor: pointer; }
.typeahead-item:hover { background: rgb(17, 22, 31); }
.typeahead-empty { padding: 8px 10px; color: rgb(107, 116, 131); }
:root { --bg: #0f1216; --panel: #171b21; --text: #e6edf3; --muted: #9aa4b2; --border: #242a33; --accent: #4aa3ff; }
#c7-topbar { background: var(--bg); color: var(--text); font-family: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Arial; }

#c7-topbar .wrap { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0px auto; padding: 12px 18px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; gap: 8px; flex-wrap: wrap; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(20, 24, 33); }
#c7-topbar .title { font-size: 18px; font-weight: 800; }
#c7-topbar nav { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; flex-wrap: wrap; }
#c7-topbar nav a { margin-right: 0px; text-decoration: none; border: 1px solid var(--border); padding: 6px 10px; border-radius: 8px; color: rgb(203, 213, 225); }
#c7-topbar nav a.active { border-color: rgb(59, 130, 246); color: rgb(230, 237, 243); }
#c7-topbar nav a:hover { border-color: rgb(51, 65, 85); }
#c7-topbar .row { display: flex; gap: 8px; align-items: center; }
#c7-topbar button { background: transparent; border: 1px solid var(--border); color: rgb(203, 213, 225); padding: 6px 10px; border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; }
#c7-topbar button:hover { border-color: rgb(51, 65, 85); }
#c7-topbar input[type="file"] { display: none; }
.c7dbg { position: fixed; top: 12px; right: 12px; width: 440px; z-index: 999999; font: 12px / 1.5 ui-monospace, monospace; color: rgb(230, 237, 243); }
.c7card { background: rgb(23, 27, 33); border: 1px solid rgb(36, 42, 51); border-radius: 12px; padding: 10px; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.45) 0px 6px 24px; }
.c7row { display: flex; gap: 6px; align-items: center; flex-wrap: wrap; }
.c7btn { background: rgb(74, 163, 255); color: rgb(0, 19, 41); border: 0px; padding: 6px 10px; border-radius: 8px; font-weight: 800; cursor: pointer; }
.c7btn.ghost { background: transparent; color: rgb(154, 164, 178); border: 1px solid rgb(36, 42, 51); }
.c7pre { background: rgb(11, 15, 20); border: 1px solid rgb(36, 42, 51); border-radius: 8px; padding: 8px; max-height: 300px; overflow: auto; white-space: pre-wrap; }
.c7pill { display: inline-flex; align-items: center; gap: 6px; padding: 2px 8px; border-radius: 999px; border: 1px solid rgb(36, 42, 51); }
.ok { background: rgba(23, 201, 100, 0.12); color: rgb(23, 201, 100); border-color: rgba(23, 201, 100, 0.35); }
.err { background: rgba(243, 18, 96, 0.12); color: rgb(243, 18, 96); border-color: rgba(243, 18, 96, 0.35); }
.warn { background: rgba(245, 165, 36, 0.12); color: rgb(245, 165, 36); border-color: rgba(245, 165, 36, 0.35); }

#topbar-root.outer:
Civilization 7 Tracker
Home World Wonders Natural Wonders Independent Peoples Results Data Editor

#cityName.outer: <input id="cityName" placeholder="Type a city name" autocomplete="off">
